message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I think it will be very valuable to you, and this is a fair price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
